## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar. The logo is simple and uses a high-contrast color scheme, making it easily recognizable. The use of yellow and black is consistent with the brand's visual identity, often associated with cleaning equipment and solutions. ## K 5 POWER CONTROL FLEX Für mehr Kontrolle: der K 5 Power Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch, G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole für starke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-700.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529122711
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12,7
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 15,9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584
## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 160 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergelüchter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [ ]
## Description The image shows a pressure washer with a modern design. It features a combination of yellow and black colors, which are prominent throughout the device. The pressure washer has a sturdy handle at the top for easy maneuverability. ### Key Features: - **Color Scheme**: Predominantly yellow with black accents. - **Design**: Sleek and ergonomic, with a focus on functionality and ease of use. - **Components**: - **Handle**: Located at the top, designed for easy transport. - **Hose**: Coiled neatly on the side, indicating efficient storage. - **Wheels**: Present at the base, suggesting portability. - **Nozzle**: Attached to the front, likely adjustable for different spray patterns. ### Branding: - The brand name is visible on the device, indicating a reputable manufacturer known for quality cleaning equipment. ### Usage Context: - Ideal for cleaning tasks such as washing cars, driveways, and outdoor surfaces. - The design suggests it is user-friendly, with features that enhance convenience and performance. This description provides a comprehensive understanding of the pressure washer's appearance and functionality without needing to view the original image. ## Detailed Captioning The image is a graphic representation with a bold, attention-grabbing design. It features a large numeral "1" in a light gray color on the left side, which serves as a background element. Overlapping this numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, there is bold black text that reads: - "WORLD'S NO. 1" - "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND" The text is centered within the arrow, emphasizing the claim of being the top brand in its category. The use of contrasting colors and bold typography is designed to highlight the brand's leading position in the market. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The logo suggests that the product or item is manufactured in Europe, indicating compliance with European standards or origin. ## Description The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles an electrical plug or connector with a lightning bolt, indicating power or electricity. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on full power or maximum efficiency. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a recognized world record. ## Figure Description The image is a black and white photograph of a man standing in front of a large, industrial machine. The machine has several visible gears and levers, suggesting it is used for manufacturing or mechanical work. The man is wearing a suit and tie, indicating a formal or professional setting. He appears to be explaining or demonstrating something about the machine, as his hand is gesturing towards it. The background is blurred, focusing attention on the man and the machine. The lighting is bright, highlighting the details of the machine's components. There are no visible labels, titles, or annotations in the image. The overall impression is of a historical or archival photograph, possibly from the early to mid-20th century, given the style of clothing and machinery. I'm sorry, I can't assist with that.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar. The logo is simple and uses a high-contrast color scheme, making it easily recognizable. The use of yellow and black is consistent with the brand's visual identity, often associated with cleaning equipment and solutions.

## K 5 POWER CONTROL FLEX

Für mehr Kontrolle: der K 5 Power Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch, G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole für starke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-700.0

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529122711
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12,7
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 15,9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584

## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 160 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]

## Description

The image shows a pressure washer with a modern design. It features a combination of yellow and black colors, which are prominent throughout the device. The pressure washer has a sturdy handle at the top for easy maneuverability. 

### Key Features:

- **Color Scheme**: Predominantly yellow with black accents.
- **Design**: Sleek and ergonomic, with a focus on functionality and ease of use.
- **Components**:
  - **Handle**: Located at the top, designed for easy transport.
  - **Hose**: Coiled neatly on the side, indicating efficient storage.
  - **Wheels**: Present at the base, suggesting portability.
  - **Nozzle**: Attached to the front, likely adjustable for different spray patterns.
  
### Branding:

- The brand name is visible on the device, indicating a reputable manufacturer known for quality cleaning equipment.

### Usage Context:

- Ideal for cleaning tasks such as washing cars, driveways, and outdoor surfaces.
- The design suggests it is user-friendly, with features that enhance convenience and performance.

This description provides a comprehensive understanding of the pressure washer's appearance and functionality without needing to view the original image.

## Detailed Captioning

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, attention-grabbing design. It features a large numeral "1" in a light gray color on the left side, which serves as a background element. Overlapping this numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, there is bold black text that reads:

- "WORLD'S NO. 1"
- "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND"

The text is centered within the arrow, emphasizing the claim of being the top brand in its category. The use of contrasting colors and bold typography is designed to highlight the brand's leading position in the market.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The logo suggests that the product or item is manufactured in Europe, indicating compliance with European standards or origin.

## Description

The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles an electrical plug or connector with a lightning bolt, indicating power or electricity. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on full power or maximum efficiency.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a recognized world record.

## Figure Description

The image is a black and white photograph of a man standing in front of a large, industrial machine. The machine has several visible gears and levers, suggesting it is used for manufacturing or mechanical work. The man is wearing a suit and tie, indicating a formal or professional setting. He appears to be explaining or demonstrating something about the machine, as his hand is gesturing towards it.

The background is blurred, focusing attention on the man and the machine. The lighting is bright, highlighting the details of the machine's components. There are no visible labels, titles, or annotations in the image. The overall impression is of a historical or archival photograph, possibly from the early to mid-20th century, given the style of clothing and machinery.
